entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:55 a.m. MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except east 80 gusting to 100 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Blizzard and snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except east 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Blizzard and snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h except east 40 gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains in the morning. Wind becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023
